elements.title: Renée Elise Goldsberry: ‘Staring’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Renée Elise Goldsberry: ‘Staring’

 Best New Music

You may recognize Tony and Grammy winner Renée Elise Goldsberry from her role as Angelica Schuyler in the filmed version of Hamilton.

Jun. 27

elements.title: S.G. Goodman: ‘Snapping Turtle’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
S.G. Goodman: ‘Snapping Turtle’

 Best New Music

Born and bred in Western Kentucky, S.G. Goodman is an old soul of a storyteller whose work points to ancient traditions and lost ways of life.

Jun. 26

elements.title: Night Tapes: ‘Pacifico’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Night Tapes: ‘Pacifico’

 Best New Music

London’s Night Tapes are set to release their hotly-anticipated debut album, portals//polarities, on September 26.

Jun. 25

elements.title: Lido Pimienta: ‘¿Quién Tiene La Luz? (El Perdón)’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Lido Pimienta: ‘¿Quién Tiene La Luz? (El Perdón)’

 Best New Music

Colombian chanteuse Lido Pimienta broke out in 2020 with her third album, Miss Colombia.

Jun. 24

elements.title: Erick The Architect: ‘All That I Need’ (feat. Haile Supreme) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Erick The Architect: ‘All That I Need’ (feat. Haile Supreme)

 Best New Music

Erick The Architect is a man with a résumé: his recent collaborators include Jungle, L’Imperatrice, George Clinton, James Blake, and Channel Tres, among many others.

Jun. 23

elements.title: Silvana Estrada: ‘Como Un Pájaro’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Silvana Estrada: ‘Como Un Pájaro’

 Best New Music

During the pandemic, Silvana Estrada found herself home alone and broken-hearted. She was also facing some serious insomnia so she picked up her guitar and went to work.

Jun. 20

elements.title: Mocky: ‘Music Will Explain’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Mocky: ‘Music Will Explain’

 Best New Music

AI can’t feel the beat, but Mocky can. That’s why this groovy single uses live instrumentation and analog recording to celebrate the power of the human voice.

Jun. 19

elements.title: url: ‘skin’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
url: ‘skin’

 Best New Music

Brooklyn-based artist and producer url just dropped this indie-pop love song that’s built from English and French vocal samples.

Jun. 18
